name: Mega City Four
description:
'''Mega City Four''' were an English [[indie music|indie rock]] band formed in [[Farnborough, Hampshire]], who obtained popularity throughout the late 1980s and 1990s.

Mega City Four consisted of guitarist and vocalist [[Darren Brown (musician)|Wiz]], his brother and rhythm guitarist Danny Brown, bassist Gerry Bryant and drummer Chris Jones. According to ''[[Uncut (magazine)|Uncut]]'' magazine, the group "earned a reputation across the globe as an exciting live band".
